presentation_title: MenuFlow AI: Smart Menus for Modern Restaurants

title_slide.title: MenuFlow AI: The Future of Dynamic Restaurant Menus

slides.title: The Broken Menu
slides.body:
• Restaurants lose $162B annually to food waste.
• Static menus fail to adapt to diner tastes and inventory.
slides.image_prompt: A concerned restaurant owner looking at a pile of unsold fresh produce in a kitchen, soft moody lighting.

slides.title: A Massive Market
slides.body:
• $900B+ US Restaurant industry provides a huge TAM.
• Our SAM is the $72B tech-forward independent restaurant sector.
• We are targeting a $3.6B beachhead market in 5 major US cities.

slides.title: Introducing MenuFlow AI
slides.body:
• An AI platform that builds dynamic, profitable menus in real-time.
• Reduce food waste by up to 25% while boosting check size by 15%.
slides.image_prompt: A sleek tablet showing a beautiful, interactive digital menu in a high-end restaurant setting. The menu items have dynamic pricing and availability indicators.

slides.title: Intelligent Menu Engine
slides.body:
• Our AI analyzes inventory levels, sales data, and diner profiles.
• It then suggests optimal dishes, pricing, and wine pairings.
slides.image_prompt: A sophisticated data visualization dashboard showing connections between ingredient inventory, customer preferences, and dynamic menu item suggestions. Glowing nodes and lines on a dark background.

slides.title: Unique Value
slides.body:
• Hyper-Personalization - Menus adapt to individual diner preferences.
• Waste Reduction AI - Predictive analytics minimize ingredient spoilage.
• Seamless Integration - Connects to existing POS and inventory systems.

slides.title: Simple SaaS Pricing
slides.body:
• Tiered monthly subscription based on restaurant size.
• Pro Tier - $199/mo for core features and analytics.
• Enterprise Tier - Custom pricing for multi-location chains.
slides.image_prompt: Clean infographic showing three pricing tiers with simple icons representing small, medium, and large restaurants. Minimalist and professional design.

slides.title: Early Market Success
slides.body:
• 25 pilot restaurants signed in NYC and SF.
• 22% average increase in profit margin for our partners.
slides.image_prompt: An elegant logo wall featuring fictional but realistic logos of high-end, trendy restaurants. The logos are displayed on a clean, light-colored background.

slides.title: Competitive Edge
slides.body:
• Toast POS ($2B revenue) - Inventory is manual, not predictive. | Our AI saves owners 8-10 hours weekly.
• UpMenu (5K customers) - Offers static digital menus only. | Our dynamic personalization increases LTV by 18%.
• SevenRooms ($100M funding) - Focuses on CRM, not menu COGS. | We directly impact the highest cost center.

slides.title: Our Team
slides.body:
• Aisha Khan, CEO - Former Product Lead at DoorDash, 10+ years in food tech.
• Ben Carter, CTO - PhD in ML from Stanford, ex-Google AI research scientist.
• Maria Flores, Head of Sales - Grew restaurant SaaS startup from 0 to $5M ARR.
• David Chen, Culinary Advisor - James Beard award-winning chef and restaurateur.

slides.title: The Road Ahead
slides.body:
• Projecting $2.5M ARR by Year 2.
• Targeting 500 restaurant partners in 18 months.
slides.image_prompt: A clean, minimalist line graph showing steep upward trajectory for revenue growth over three years. The graph is highlighted in a warm terracotta accent color.

slides.title: Our Ask
slides.body:
• We are raising a $2M seed round.
• For Product (40%), Sales & Marketing (35%), and Operations (25%).
• This provides an 18-month runway to achieve our key milestones.
